entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 7:14 PM CST Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:14 PM CST Friday 7 April 2023
